reviews.review_msg: He is just a kind and great person who cares deeply about his field and transfers that to students in an accommodating manner. Great at being available outside of class time and providing advice, and it's a joy to hear the targents he goes on which leave you feeling a little inspired if that's not cheesy to say.
BEST professor I had in 4 years!! Really nice and informative classes. David is just so nice!! Awesome professor!! Hope to take a course with him again.
